cyclone.name: IDALIA
cyclone.current_location: about 195 mi SW of Tampa, FL and 300 mi S of Tallahassee, FL
cyclone.trajectory: moving north-northeast and expected to cross Florida’s Big Bend, then sweep NE along the GA/SC/NC coasts
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Florida Big Bend coast (near Cedar Key-Aucilla River area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane/Tropical-storm watches focus on FL Big Bend through SC coast; none west of Indian Pass, FL
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane and storm-surge warnings extend from the middle of Longboat Key, FL to Indian Pass, FL; no warnings west of that point
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Greatest impact expected from FL Big Bend eastward through GA and the Carolinas; minimal effects on AL coast
weather_observation.wind: Occasional gusts 25–35 mph possible Wednesday as outer rain-bands pass well east
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected; water rise generally ≤1 ft along AL coast
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous rip currents and higher surf along Gulf beaches
